hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Epona's Song#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say Goron fabrics protect against more than fire.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #the Minuet of Forest#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Fire Temple## has #9# major items.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Iron Boots#.

GV (Waterfall).text: @ tries to read the Gossip Stone...^${12 48 06}but he's standing on the wrong side of it!

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Malon).text: They say that racing #Damp's ghost# rewards...^ #the Biggoron Sword# and #an Ice Cavern Compass#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Temple of Time# is on the path to #the Key#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #the Biggoron Sword# and #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Like Like Chest

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Water Temple Small Key#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Epona's Song#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that within the #valley#, the crate and waterfall conceal...^ #a Map of the Fire Temple# and #a Dodongo's Cavern Compass#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##Kakariko Village## has #13# major items.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Forest Temple Small Key# and #a Slingshot#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Green Potion Bottle#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #the Minuet of Forest#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Ganon's Castle Small Key#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path of #time#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Goron Tunic#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Iron Boots#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Water Temple Small Key#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that winning the #treasure chest game# rewards #a Slingshot#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #collecting cuccos# rewards #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to the #Kakariko Bazaar#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to the #House of Skulltula#.
